headerDisplay: Calendar Scheduler plugin for Homebridge, which allows flexible scheduling of triggers with repeats using any iCal calendar.
footerDisplay: Visit the Project [Readme](https://github.com/uamanager/homebridge-calendar-scheduler#readme) for more details.

calendars.title: Calendars
calendars.description: Add one or more calendars below.

calendarName.title: Calendar Name
calendarName.description: A unique name for the calendar. Will be used as the accessory name and default sensor for any calendar events.

calendarUrl.title: Calendar Url
calendarUrl.description: The address of the calendar. Can be a `webcal://`, a `http://` or an `https://` URL.

calendarUpdateInterval.title: Calendar Update Interval
calendarUpdateInterval.description: The polling interval the plugin uses to retrieve calendar updates in minutes. If not set, the plugin will update the calendar ones in 60 minutes.

calendarUpdateButton.title: Calendar Update Button
calendarUpdateButton.description: If set to true, then button for manual update available for each configured calendar.

calendarTriggerOnUpdates.title: Trigger on progress update
calendarTriggerOnUpdates.description: If set to true, then every minute calendar sensor trigger update if any active event.

calendarEvents.title: Events
calendarEvents.description: Add one or more calendar events below.

eventName.title: Event Name
eventName.description: A unique name for the calendar event. Will be used as calendar sensor for matched calendar event.

eventTriggerOnUpdates.title: Trigger on progress update
eventTriggerOnUpdates.description: If set to true, then every minute sensor trigger update for active event.
